website_summaries.verdict: This highly adaptable chore chart features see-through pockets so you can see what's left undone. Plus, you'll never need to pick dropped magnets up off the floor.
pros: Flexibly allows you to reward some chores and simply give reminders for others
Includes 34 different self-care options and 54 chore cards
cons: Large chart with lots of cards can be heavy on a wall

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, Practical, and Functional
customer_reviews.text: We've changed things around a little since I took this picture, but that's a feature of this program that makes it so useful. It's very versatile so you can adapt it as you need. My kids love working for rewards, but also lose tickets for specific instances of disrespect, etc. They are learning that some things are just expected or they lose tickets for not doing them. Everything is not a reward, but it's a learning experience. Best system I've found for where we are with our 6 and 8 year old. Customer service is exceptional as well -- visit the website and email your questions. Top notch service.
customer_reviews.author: Liz P.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for our family
customer_reviews.text: We have been using the chart for a couple of weeks now and it’s working great! I had to invest a couple of hours to set it up for the first time, but now it only takes a 2-3 minutes to set up daily. I can see how this chart can be effective for a variety of ages. My kids are 4 and 9. I had a question and contacted the seller. She reasponded timely and answered my question. Overall my experience with this product is great! I would recommended to any parent who wants to get his/her kids more involved in chores/responsibilities around the home.
customer_reviews.author: Sugeiy

customer_reviews.title: The best chore chart out there!
customer_reviews.text: We love this versatile chart system. We have been using it for 2 months now. We have tried several other ones without much success in the past. These cards help the children understand and process each task throughout the day. This system is highly customizable but also easy to set up. Plus the company offers lots of support/ideas online. This one is ‘the one!’
customer_reviews.author: RGC

customer_reviews.title: Like everything thus far- minus the pen
customer_reviews.text: Like everything thus far- minus the pen. The pen is neat because it does kind of erase what is written on the cards, however the pen: - smears - hard to erase with - leaves indents of what was written prior Many cards I need the same of for each day of the week, others I do not have any use for these particular cards. Would like a way to order specific cards by individual custom order. Or even have a way to customize the cards specifically tailored to what each family could use.
customer_reviews.author: Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: A positive game changer for our kiddos
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best investments my wife and I could have made. Upon opening the box and getting questions from my 6 and 4 year old boys, we explained how they could earn tickets. Boy did they take into it right away. We have it set up each night for the next day. The boys know just where to go to get their stuff done. The one reason for the 3 star and not a 5 star is that one of the card holders has bad stitching which results in the cards not staying in their assigned slots. I hope to get feedback from their customer service here soon for a replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron D.

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted and more
customer_reviews.text: I really like the idea behind this product/system. It is what I had been wanting to create for my kids but didn't have to send the hours designing it. It has great customization options included and great implementation ideas for all ages. I felt very overwhelmed with all the options ( I split it into 2 kits for very different ages). I simply could decided what option I liked better...lol
customer_reviews.author: Dickson2782

customer_reviews.title: Wroks better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I love the flexibility of this product, and my 3-year-old daughter was excited to start getting tickets to get a doll she saw in the store. The pictures help as she has not started reading but knows what to do by looking at the pics. The package can work with miscellaneous cards that allow for any unique situation to be resolved. The cards may bend over time an one can laminate and find a writing instrument that can be erased.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: There is a card for everything - and blanks for those missed. I love that there is a place to write, but it also has pictures of the chores, very helpful for little ones. The only thing I wish I had known is that the chart comes in pieces with no way of connection, other than hanging them close, I wish maybe there had been velcro or some way of putting it together in an easier way. Great product, recommend 9/10
customer_reviews.author: Lix

customer_reviews.title: Poor Manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: I really like the idea of this chore chart. It is very customizable. However, the manufacturing is of poor quality. The bottom right hand corner pocker of each panel has been sewn too small and do not fit the cards. Also, each panel has not been symmetrically cut and therefore do not allow for panels to come together neatly. I really looked forward to using this item. Unfortunately, these two issues are major factors in being able to construct the chore chart. At this price point, I expect to be able to use this item as advertised rather cutting cards and panels to fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Matthews

customer_reviews.title: He has autism and I was told he needed a visual schedule and a way to feel like he has some control in his life
customer_reviews.text: This has been so helpful for my son. He has autism and I was told he needed a visual schedule and a way to feel like he has some control in his life. This system has really helped him have a sense of predictability and he loves being able to see how his work is connected to earning money and game time for himself
customer_reviews.author: ComputeryChemistry

customer_reviews.title: A Chore Chart I'm Able to Use for Years
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching high and low for a chore chart for my 7yo. After comparing charts and reading reviews, I found the Neatlings Chore System. I love how it can be customized, from one child to several; from daily chores to weekly and even bonuses. After setting it up, in one day I have seen my child so excited to completed her chores and earn tickets. Plus, we'll be able to use this chart for years, thanks to the more advanced chores supplied. I admit, like other reviewers, it is a bit pricey. However, this chore system really allows you to customize how you want to set it up. It's worth it to me to have such functionality!
customer_reviews.author: steffie

customer_reviews.title: Way Overpriced!
customer_reviews.text: This is way overpriced. I’m so disappointed this cost $70. I thought this would be larger, more versatile, & more elaborate than what it actually is. It’s 4 small panels, a pin, and some cards. That’s is literally it. I totally wasted my money. Save your $70. Go with something cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: LitaaBee

customer_reviews.title: Build Responsibility with Flexibility
customer_reviews.text: Love this chart! I recommend it for families that need to keep track of chores but need flexibility in their system. This chore chart finally gave our family an organized, yet flexible, system to track responsibilities and chores for our three young daughters (twins age 6 and younger sister age 5). Daily personal responsibilities do not change, but the chart allows me flexibility to change daily household responsibilities and chores. We even have space for bonus activities/chores and a slot for them to place their completed chore cards. I tally the tickets each evening and we settle up (allowance or technology time) on Sundays.
customer_reviews.author: Mandidee

customer_reviews.title: Like everything thus far- minus the pen
customer_reviews.text: Like everything thus far- minus the pen. The pen is neat because it does kind of erase what is written on the cards, however the pen: - smears - hard to erase with - leaves indents of what was written prior Many cards I need the same of for each day of the week, others I do not have any use for these particular cards. Would like a way to order specific cards by individual custom order. Or even have a way to customize the cards specifically tailored to what each family could use.
customer_reviews.author: Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with product. Contacted seller about a special request after this purchase and they were extremely prompt and helpful. Still early on how kids will enjoy long term, but quality was great. Also, these charts are so flexible to adapt to you family needs based on number of children, types of chore(self-care, family, or bonus) and reward options. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. It covers tons of chores and works really well for our home. Currently using it for a 4 and 9 year old. 4 year old is less interested than the 9 year old but it's a start and much better organized than what I could come up with on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: just wish the quality of the inserts was better for the money
customer_reviews.text: The system is working well so far, just wish the quality of the inserts was better for the money. They should at least be laminated it seems. The pen that came with the system was broken, too.
customer_reviews.author: complex electra

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Well organized and thought out. It took a bit of time to set it up only because I'm not the most organized/consistent person. It's nice because if something isn't working, you can easily change and modify to accommodate your family's style. Easy to use. Clear instructions and helpful suggestions. Check out the website for additional details.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Auran

customer_reviews.title: Neat, Concise, Convenient, and I didn't have to put it together!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been fighting to figure out a workable chore system in our home for the last six years, since our oldest turned five. It's been an ongoing battle to figure out which chores are paid and which ones are personal responsibility as well as trying to find the age-appropriate options for our kids ranging in age from 2-11. I am pleased that we finally found this chore system and already the kids are excited for chores every week. Now I just have to figure out what the Family Store is going to stock, because they're begging for some options. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Beth Peloquin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent. I have a 6yo and a 4yo. 6yo is just learning to read so the pictures are helpful to her and essential to my 4yo. There are SO many cards to use plus some that you can write in your own chores. Super happy we went with this rather than one of the less $$ ones without pics.
customer_reviews.author: Kerryn O'Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: My elementary age children have been using this job chart for over 6 months, and it has been working great! We've been able to make small adjustments along the way to tweak the chart perfectly for each child. Things that I like about this product: --Good quality cards and nice graphics engage the children --Jobs are well thought out and appropriate for many ages --Pocket chart allows for great customization--we've changed the configuration several times without confusing the children. Money well spent! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional customer service and a Great product to boot
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional customer service. I love it when I can actually talk with the creator of a product and hear their passion for what they have created. This is a great system and I look forward to fully implementing. The cool thing about it is it is very versatile and customizable. She really put a lot of thought and effort in to her product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Easy chore chart with lots of detailed cards
customer_reviews.text: I just put this up yesterday and I love the variety of the cards included. It seems pretty self-explanatory and easy to use so far. My daughter was very excited to see all the things that she could do to win tickets. So I am very hopeful that this will work to teach my children responsibility.
customer_reviews.author: pagemaven

customer_reviews.title: HATE HATE HATE HATE this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Could not find this more frustrating.... as a super busy mom of three boys I need a great organizing chart and maybe this is it but I'll never know b/c it comes in multiple velcroid parts that don't go together and a TON of fine-print instructions that I need my readers for.... There is not a single thing about this that I'd recommend because I can't even get past the first few seconds!!
customer_reviews.author: Leah S. Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for 11 and 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: I am using it for my 11 and 6 year old. So far it has been working great. We are transitioning from unlimited screentime to using the ticket system and it's been great. Thank you for such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: The best system!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this system! It is very easy to use and has tons of flexibility for our family needs. We change chores daily based on what is going on and the opportunities our kids will have. The tickets are easy to manage and for my kids to understand. My 4 and 6 year old love to earns tickets for screen time now! It has truly changed how our household works.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Christian

customer_reviews.title: Customizable
customer_reviews.text: I have a 9 year old and 6 year old. Both were excited to help build the chore chart and look forward to the reward. The product is flexible. We have daily tasks, weekly and am/ pm tasks. Some are responsibilities and some earn tickets/ money. Its fun and the house looks great. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: I paid $65. 00 for this to open it ...
customer_reviews.text: I paid $65.00 for this to open it and have a chunk of the cards written on and another chunk with boxes already checked in pen ....so I paid 65 dollars for a used item. Unreal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped my child with ADHD
customer_reviews.text: Best thing to happen to my family. I can custom it for my family needs. I have a son who has severe ADHD and this has made a world of difference keeping himself on schedule and focused. Where it gives him positive reinforcement that makes him want to do his daily tasks without me nagging him. It even helps keep me on track as it can be hard with a child who had ADHD.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 6 and almost 8 year olds love this!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for about a month now. I’m still adapting it to fit our family but the kids love it. It is particularly motivating for the almost 8 year old. They love the family store but I’m hoping they will soon learn to forego the excitement of getting a new trinket right now in order to receive money to save for a larger purchase later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: We love our neatling chore chart! I've tried different ones in the passed that never really stuck. My 7 year old definately feels more rewarded completing her chores everyday and is starting to have a grasp money management since we coupled it with her allowance. We like making one for us (mom and dad) so my 7 year old know everyone has a part in managing the household and it makes for a fun family project!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little overwhelming with all the options for set up. But we figured out a simple and easy way for my 2 los to achieve and accomplish the goals set for them. They have been so EAGER to help out lately!! I’ll take what I can get!
customer_reviews.author: KDM

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly versatile!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great system that can be used many different ways. The cards are incredibly comprehensive to personal and household responsibilities, and the flexibility of how to utilize the holders is a wonderful feature. My son was super excited to get started and begin earning points!
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: I like this. My kids are excited about it- now ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this. My kids are excited about it- now I just have to find the time to get us set up on it. I think it's a quality product. I will probably buy more cards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: I should have purchased this a long time ago! My kids enjoy doing chores now! Yes it’s a little pricey for a chore chart, but this one is for 3 kids, and has every single chore imaginable and a couple to write on. I love the system. It’s user friendly for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Stanton

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It’s been in use for a few days ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It’s been in use for a few days now and the kids are really enjoying the tickets and working for them. Thank you for creating this! Next, I’d love to see one for 4 kids :)
customer_reviews.author: frisky0825

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chart and owner
customer_reviews.text: I love this chore chart and so do my kids. I also wanted extra of one of the items and was immediately responded back to when inquiring.
customer_reviews.author: B J Smart

customer_reviews.title: We are still fine tuning how we use it
customer_reviews.text: We are still fine tuning how we use it, but it's working! The fact that the kids can hold and manipulate their "list" of chores keeps them connected.
customer_reviews.author: Heather C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been searching for something like this that is versatile for older kids. There is so much on the market for young kids but as they get older and you’re still working with behaviors it becomes difficult to find a system that will work. This is a great step in motivating them.
customer_reviews.author: Craftery

customer_reviews.title: BEST THIBG I EVER BOUGHT
customer_reviews.text: My kids have never been so excited about chores, having tactile way for them to track their progress and they definitely love having bonus chores for extra tickets.

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are excited to do chores and earn points or money!!! Very organized and worth the money to get some help with being a working mom from the little people as well.

customer_reviews.title: Making chores a little more fun
customer_reviews.text: This ended up being a really great way to organize chores and reward the children accordingly. They actually have FUN doing it and competing with each other for the most points!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great idea and materials. I just need a nanny to help me stay consistent!

customer_reviews.title: A game changer for those who want to stop nagging kids about chores!
customer_reviews.text: Really love the idea of this and it has helped. Still trying to figure out the best was to configure for my three kids: 14, 11, and 3. It will take a little time but we really like it!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The chore chart is awesome it gives my kids stuff to do without having to be asked and they know they ate building up credits for every chore completed they're asking to do more which is a big surprise hahaha thank you

customer_reviews.title: Great accountability system!
customer_reviews.text: I totally love Neatlings. The chore cards have colorful pictures of the chore related to that card. There are also blank chore cards included incase you need to add a chore with an erasable pin. Every chore is covered even pet duties. I recommend neatlings to anyone who is ready to hold there child accountable for there chores.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for this busy mom!!
customer_reviews.text: With 5 children, this chore system keeps my kids on task! Even the little ones who can’t read, see the pictures and know what they need to be doing!! A must have for anyone who is having a hard time with their kids getting their chores done!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great for three kids and I loved the pre printed chore cards with pictures! Works great for a household with 3 kids.

customer_reviews.title: They love being able to see what they need to do ...
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had this for very long but the kids are starting to get the hang of it. They love being able to see what they need to do and have some control of what needs to get done. There has been less arguing and it's a great system so far. Yay! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We just started using it, but I think it will help my little guy as he is very visual

customer_reviews.text: Really helped in organizing my kids chores, and allowed them to physically see what they need to do and let's them take care of things themselves, and definitely helps them feel responsible

customer_reviews.title: ) The kids love it and it is working so well
customer_reviews.text: This system has allowed me as a mother to not have to talk so much :) The kids love it and it is working so well!!

customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and she loves it! It's great for busy parents and for building character and responsibility!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cards and display unit
customer_reviews.text: I think this is kind of pricey for what it is. Ought to be about half the price. But I bought it, knowing what it was... so I guess I shouldn't fault them for that. Good quality cards and display unit. Requires discipline and a good motivational system, so it's not a miracle on its own, but the foundation is there.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit as I'd like
customer_reviews.text: I just simply don't like it. It isn't fitting into my chore routine or what I wanted to accomplish. Too many irrelevant cards to what appropriate for my kids, plus very expensive for what you get. I found myself printing off what I wanted my kids to do and taping to cards, and buying regular playing cards at the store to add to it. I still don't like it, nor do my kids. I wish I had taken a little more time to pay attention to exactly what was actually on the cards.

customer_reviews.title: Love..Love.. Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this chore chart.. Exceptional customer service! My kids were so excited to start and help set up and actually do the chores!

customer_reviews.title: Great concept and simple to follow!
customer_reviews.text: Great concept to assist kids in chores, easy to set up. My daughter tries to move the chore cards around and then lost interest but that may be my fault for not following through. Once school starts, I will introduce the chore board again and stuck to my guns this time. I will follow-up with a later review.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality and concept
customer_reviews.text: Good concept but not enough cards for things I'd like my kids to do daily (like brushing their teeth or picking up their clothes).

customer_reviews.title: Such a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Best chore/incentive chart ever. Well worth the investment. So versatile and it works great for my 4 year old. I know it will grow with him.

customer_reviews.title: Encouragement chart
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this for myself. I use it to inspire me to exercise. I use the tickets cards to earn points to then purchase something. If I had children, I would totally use this for chores. Nice size, cards are colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrin A Harris

customer_reviews.title: Best chore chart ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this chore chart! It’s worked wonders for all 3 of our kids and the Reward system is amazing. They know exactly what to do and how to make fun money by doing chores. It’s awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

product_meta.title: NEATLINGS Chore System - Chore Chart for Kids | 80+ Chores for Toddlers to Teens | Customize for 1-3 Kids | Size 25”x18” | Teal Household Chore Cards/Dark Blue, Red, Yellow Self-Care Chore Cards
product_meta.description:
Color:Dark Blue, Red, Yellow - Chart for Up to 3 ChildrenIncludes simple chores for young ones & more challenging chores for older children. 

Step 1:CHOOSE CHORE CHART CONFIGURATION 

Step 2:CONFIGURE YOUR CHORE CHART- connect the chart panels, add title cards & labels. 

Step 3:IMPLEMENTING 
1.Introduce the Chore Chart configuration that you will be using. 
2.Let the children select a self-care deck. 
3.Together select chores that you would like your child to complete the next day. 
4.Time to Settle Up! Review what chores have been completed throughout the day & what has been earned. Pay them their tickets for that day and together choose new chores for the next day. A common time is in the evening. They will be excited to plan what they will earn next! 

Tips: 
- Pay for the Work For Tickets chore cards only when the Responsibility chores cards are completed. 
- Offer double payment if they do all their chores without complaint. 
- When your child completes a chore, have them turn it around & place it behind any other cards in that pocket. At a glance you can see if all the child’s chores have been completed. 

Example: 
- Parent decides to pay child 1 ticket per completed chore & if all the chores are completed for that day without complaint they agree to double the tickets per chore. 
-Child does all the chores without complaint and earns a total of 8 tickets for that day. 
- For this example the parent is willing to pay .25 per ticket or 15 minutes of screen time. 
- This child decides to use 6 tickets for 1.5 hours of screen time. 
- Each day the child does the same thing. At the end of the week the child earned 56 tickets by doing 28 chores without complaint, enjoyed 10.5 hours of screen time, earned a playdate from the family store for 10 tickets, & pocketed $1.00. 

WOW! Twenty-eight more chores in a week! Your child feels great about what they’ve accomplished, is learning new skills, & how to manage time & money!
feature_bullets: ✓ CUSTOMIZABLE – Multiple child chore chart - customize for 1 to 3 Children. Unlike other charts this system can be set up differently for each child and will grow with your children. Complete with over 80+ self-care and household chores – works for any age; includes simple chores for toddlers and more complicated chores for teens. Chore chart can be configured and reconfigured in a multitude of ways. Have more than 3 kids? Simply connect another NEATLINGS system to expand – it’s modular!

✓ AWESOME RESPONSIBILITY & REWARD CHART FOR KIDS – Want to assign some jobs as a child’s nonrewarded responsibilities & others as rewarded chores? Other chore charts only allow the same reward value, often a star, be given whether your child cleaned the entire living room or just got the mail. Our system was specifically designed to grow with your child’s development & lets parents set different reward values for different jobs. Fun artwork makes it easy for both readers & beginning readers.

✓ HOUSEHOLD & SELF-CARE CHORES FOR EVERY AGE – Includes 3 decks of 34 self-care chores with 21 coordinating reward tickets. These are chores that each child needs to complete - such as make bed or practice instrument. Also, includes one shared Teal deck of 54 household chore cards. These are chores that typically only need to be done once, such as take out trash or feed pet(s). The color-coded cards allow parents’, at a glance, to see which child has done what & what still needs to be completed.

✓ COMPLETE CHORE CHART SYSTEM - With over 80+ chores this system probably includes more chores than any other system but it is not only about chores – it also teaches responsibility, life skills, & will help boost a child’s confidence. Color-coded cards ensure that a child’s earned reward cards can be safely stored in the chart itself without concern of a sibling “borrowing” another’s earned reward tickets. Easy enough to use for toddlers yet advanced enough to use for teens.

✓ INCLUDES EVERYTHING YOU NEED – Chart is lightweight & hangs easily with included hanging strips. Included erasable pen - write, erase & rewrite! No magnets to lose or dry erase board to smudge! Cards are standard playing card size of 2.5”x3”. System comes with 4 connectable pocket chart panels, each panel is apprx. 12.5”x9”. The standard set up of 2 panels down and 2 panels across creates a chart, as shown in main product image, approx. 25”x18”. Cultivate contributing, confident, can-do kids!
